title: Flail
content:
Flail Common 1~8 Damage 1d8 Bludgeoning Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal 1 Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A browning piece of brain sticks stubbornly to one of the spikes. Flail 0.9 50

Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal 1 Bludgeoning damage anyway.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A browning piece of brain sticks stubbornly to one of the spikes.

Flail is one of the Flails Weapons in Baldur's Gate
